lead_paragraph: Mr. Walcott will take over the institution, whose last president, Thomas W. Galante, was fired amid political turmoil and questions about spending in 2014.

headline.main: Dennis Walcott, Former Schools Chancellor, Is Named C.E.O. of Queens Library

snippet: Mr. Walcott will take over the institution, whose last president, Thomas W. Galante, was fired amid political turmoil and questions about spending in 2014.
abstract: Former New York City schools chancellor and deputy mayor Dennis M Walcott joins Queens Library as president and chief executive officer; system's previous president, Thomas W Galante, was ousted in 2014 amid political turmoil and questions about his spending.
